techmeme.title: Google says Pixel 9a will launch in the US, Canada, and UK on April 10; the company delayed the phone's launch to April to check "on a component quality issue" (Abner Li/9to5Google)

Interviews with Dario Amodei, Daniela Amodei, and other executives about Anthropic's origin, Claude, why DeepSeek isn't a threat, reaching AGI safely, more (Steven Levy/Wired)
Google starts offering user choice billing in the UK, initially to non-game developers, says 90%+ of developers are satisfied with Google Play's native billing (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
